name: eden - 3D Screensaver
detailed_description:
Roadmap

[Feb 2025] A note from the dev

  • There will be new updates coming for eden in the very near future. I'm aware that I've neglected this app for far too long and for that I'm truly sorry. Life got in the way, but things are getting better.


About the Software

eden is a 3D Screensaver with beautiful graphics. Discover handbuilt environments: From snow-covered mountains to a day at a sunny beach.

Please note: eden is under active development, frequently receiving updates to content and functionality free of charge! In other words: It is currently nowhere near finished, things are likely to change and everything might be a bit rough around the edges. If 'Early Access' isn't your thing at all, please consider not buying this software.

Current features

  • Lovely handmade/detailed 3D environments

  • Music and sounds matches every level (i.e stormy wind on the mountains, light breeze on the meadow)

Planned future Features

  • Workshop Integration - make your own environments and share them with the entire community

This is subject to change.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (32-bit/64-bit), Windows® 8/8.1 (32-bit/64-bit) or Windows® 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM /w Shader Model 3 & minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements as per Unity system requirements. These may change in the future.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2, Intel only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel or AMD GPU /w 2GB VRAM, minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: macOS builds are currently experimental. Minimum requirements as per Unity system requirements. These may change in the future.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ capable, minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Linux/SteamOS builds are currently experimental. Minimum requirements as per Unity system requirements. These may change in the future.
